quiz.correct: A function with same name as class

quiz.question: Which OOP concept allows a class to use properties and methods of another class?
In Java, which keyword is used to inherit a class?

options: They can only have private methods
They must contain only static methods

quiz.question: In C++, how is multiple inheritance achieved?
options: Using multiple base classes in declaration
C++ does not support multiple inheritance
quiz.correct: Using multiple base classes in declaration

quiz.question: Which OOP concept allows different classes to define methods with the same name?
In Java, an interface can contain:
Which of these best describes method overriding?
options: Two methods with same name but different parameters
Subclass provides its own version of a method
Defining multiple methods in same class
quiz.correct: Subclass provides its own version of a method

quiz.question: Which OOP principle is most closely related to real-world hierarchy (Parent → Child)?

What is the main advantage of a linked list over an array?
In a singly linked list, each node contains:
options: Data and pointer to next node
Data and pointer to previous node
quiz.correct: Data and pointer to next node

quiz.question: Which data structure is used in function call/recursion?
Which hashing technique resolves collisions by linking elements at the same index?
In a circular queue, what happens when rear reaches the end of array?
options: Rear moves to front if space is available
quiz.correct: Rear moves to front if space is available
